summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of new features: auto-offline marking and navbar export/import buttons. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Auto-offline marking works when playback fails - station gets red dot indicator and updateStationHealth() updates localStorage with isLive: false, triggering stationLiveStatusUpdate event 2) Failed stations move to bottom via sortedStations memo in HomePage.js 3) Export/Import buttons visible in navbar with data-testid navbar-export-btn and navbar-import-btn 4) Export downloads globalradio_backup_YYYY-MM-DD.json with version, exportedAt, favorites, podcastFavorites 5) Import accepts JSON file via hidden file input 6) Station sorting verified: 20 live (green) at top, 10 offline (red) at bottom 7) LocalStorage keys: globalradio_favorites, globalradio_podcast_favorites, globalradio_live_status

navbar_export_button.notes: Download icon visible in navbar, data-testid='navbar-export-btn', clicks download JSON backup file

navbar_import_button.notes: Upload icon visible in navbar, data-testid='navbar-import-btn', triggers hidden file input for .json files

export_functionality.notes: Downloads globalradio_backup_2026-02-27.json with correct structure: {version, exportedAt, favorites, podcastFavorites}

import_functionality.notes: Hidden file input with accept='.json' ready to receive backup files

auto_offline_marking.notes: When playback fails, updateStationHealth(stationId, false) is called, which updates localStorage and dispatches stationLiveStatusUpdate event. Station shows red dot indicator and 'Stream unavailable' message.

station_sorting.notes: sortedStations memo in HomePage.js correctly sorts: live (green) stations at top, offline (red) at bottom. Verified 20 live, 10 offline with correct ordering.

localStorage_persistence.notes: globalradio_live_status contains 30 station entries with isLive boolean and checkedAt timestamp. Persists across page refreshes.

status_indicators.notes: Header shows '20 live, 10 offline stations' with green/red wifi icons. Re-verify button appears for offline stations.
